@
glvdtr Actually I was referring to the epilogue chapter at the end of this tank, which comes after a dear maid chapter. You are   talking about a chapter that came after this tank which is not an epilogue but a sequel . Anyway good to know it will be translated.

@metroid The entire thing was commissioned by  Dynellen to be translated, so expect more updates until completion. The epilogue chapter was also released today and a translation bounty was placed for it, though it has harsher censoring due to it being from a digital magazine. We'll have to wait for the next tank to have it with lesser censoring.
